net.myorb.math.matrices

Class MinorMatrixWrapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.math.matrices.AbstractMatrixWrapper<T>
      • net.myorb.math.matrices.MinorMatrixWrapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type on which operations are to be executed
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MatrixAccess<T>, MinorAccess<T>

    public class MinorMatrixWrapper<T>
extends AbstractMatrixWrapper<T>
implements MinorAccess<T>
    a wrapper for matrix class objects allowing minor matrix access modeled on top of full matrix. this allows reduced object creation and no copying of content into minor matrix objects
    Author:
    Michael Druckman

      • MinorMatrixWrapper

        public MinorMatrixWrapper(Matrix<T> m,
                          int rowToEliminate,
                          int columnToEliminate)
        the top level wrapper for the full size matrix
        Parameters:
        m - the matrix object to be wrapped as a minor with eliminated row/column
        rowToEliminate - this row number will be kept in major indicies list, eliminated in minor indices
        columnToEliminate - column number to be eliminated

      • MinorMatrixWrapper

        public MinorMatrixWrapper(Matrix<T> m)
        the top level wrapper for the full size matrix. column 1 is assumed to be intended eliminated to accomodate cofactor expansion accelerated algorithm
        Parameters:
        m - the matrix object to be wrapped
